entry.title: Bitcoin Knots 27.1.knots20240621 released
entry.summary: The latest version of Bitcoin Knots, 27.1.knots20240621, has been officially released and is now accessible for download at [https://bitcoinknots.org/files/27.x/27.1.knots20240621/](https://bitcoinknots.org/files/27.x/27.1.knots20240621/). This update introduces several new features along with numerous bug fixes and enhancements aimed at improving the overall performance of the software. The developers encourage users to contribute to the project by reporting any issues they encounter using the GitHub issue tracker, which can be found at [https://github.com/bitcoinknots/bitcoin/issues](https://github.com/bitcoinknots/bitcoin/issues). Additionally, users interested in staying up-to-date with the latest announcements and updates can join the mailing list available at [https://bitcoinknots.org/list/announcements/join/](https://bitcoinknots.org/list/announcements/join/). For detailed information about what this release entails, including a comprehensive list of all the new features, bug fixes, and performance improvements, the full release notes are available for review at [https://github.com/bitcoinknots/bitcoin/blob/v27.1.knots20240621/doc/release-notes.md](https://github.com/bitcoinknots/bitcoin/blob/v27.1.knots20240621/doc/release-notes.md).
